## Transactions

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column}

* Atomicity
  * All or Nothing
  * Subjective Term: Internal Atomicity

:::

* Isolation
  * Serializability
    * No Overlap ^[@ullman2014first, p. 291]

* Timeout

:::
